bug.author: scarlett2018
bug.summary: Regression: Duration of a running job is missing
bug.description:
In v0.11.0 pai-prod-1 bed, verifying to be released 0.11, found this regression. In Previous versions, running job will set the current running times as duration before job complete: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39592018/55064776-84461980-50b5-11e9-89e6-75396722d2d3.png></denchmark-link>
In the build, duration is set to <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39592018/55064816-9a53da00-50b5-11e9-8452-1b0127eb78e1.png></denchmark-link>
